attributes.action: change the law to make it illegal to have work carried out on gas appliances by a non- industry accredited gas engineer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The industry has long been plagued by non-qualified people carrying out work on people's gas appliances.
CORGI are at most ineffective in eradicating these practices,but regulation making it illegal to use non-qualified tradesman for your domestic gas work would then put the onus of responsibility on the householder.
